titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to Theodore B. Harlan
CWG13738

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; 1863 Office Expenses - Telegraph, Stationary - Transportation - Ordinance Stores; Bundle 5

body.p:
The United States
To Theodore B. Harlan. Dr

row.cell: To Shoeing 6 3/4 Horses (27 Shoes) at Brookeville Ky for Co E 10th Ky Cavalry at 25 cents pr Shoe

body.p:
Approved
By order of the Governor
John W. Finnel
Adjt Genl Ky Vols
I certify that the above account is correct & just: that the services were rendered as stated. & that they were necessary for the public service
Received at Frankfort the 45 of Sept 1863 of S. G. Suddarth Q M GenlQuarter Master U.S. A. the sum of Six -- Dollars & Seventy five Cents in full of the above account
I hereby guarantee the genuiness of the within signature and the good faith of all transfers of this claim

No 2 Abstrt
Thoe B Harlan
$675
Paid Sept 5 1863
